channel.title: NPC drops
channel.description: Can someone help me with my NPC drops. Again. I had the old thread saved as a bookmark but since has reinstalled my browser. Can some one help?

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @volarscape volarscape
item.description:
@volarscape wrote:

depend’s on what server you have, go into npcdrop’s and just add the drops there, aca first it will be like this
2342(thats the npc which will drop) then…which item u would like it to drop ect, if i wasn’t so much busy i would of writen a long paragraph on how to do it but atm i’m helping load’s so erm, go down on a few pages down as someone has done a guide on it i read it and it’s brill, thanks anyway

Read full topic
